topic.title: Discuss (U7): Albedo
topic.text:
Hope you enjoyed the Walt Disney educational film on weather from 1959! 

In Chapter 19 - Moisture, Clouds and Weather, we were introduced to albedo.

  • In your own words, describe what "albedo" is and it's potential impacts on climate.
  • Describe what would happen if the Earth's albedo were to change.

Initial posts are due on Wednesday by 11:59pm, in which you use full sentences and proper grammar.

Respond to at least two other students' posts (at a minimum), which are due on Sunday by 11:59pm.

  • Be sure to respond to other students' posts with a substantive comment using full sentences and proper grammar.
